page.title: 19OUR FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: We have visitors on Saturdays and so we do a lot of cooking.Sometimes we visit Grandma and play tennis and croquet in Saltwell Park.Trips to Newcastle are rare as my dad hates shopping.On a typical Sunday we stay at home unless the weather is sunny.We aren't the kind for going to Church but we still believe in God.My mam and dad do not like to sit around doing nothing on a Sunday.We like fishing and making models.Cooking is another hobby.Sometimes we go camping in the wilds of Scotland because we hate camp sites.We hardly watch T.V.Instead we do handicrafts like sewing and knitting.My mam went to art classes and she likes painting.We like doing our different hobbies.We enjoy them more than anything else.
